mapper.select: SELECT MOVIE_ID ,MOVIE_TITLE ,DESCRIPTION ,RATING ,POSTER_PATH ,RELEASE_DATE FROM MOVIE WHERE STATUS IN ('S','P') ORDER BY RELEASE_DATE DESC

SELECT MOVIE_ID ,MOVIE_TITLE ,DESCRIPTION ,RATING ,POSTER_PATH ,RELEASE_DATE FROM MOVIE JOIN MOVIE_GENRE USING (MOVIE_ID) JOIN GENRE USING (GENRE_ID) JOIN MOVIE_ACTOR USING (MOVIE_ID) JOIN ACTOR USING (ACTOR_ID) WHERE
LOWER(MOVIE_TITLE)
LOWER(DIRECTOR)
LOWER(ACTOR_NAME)
LOWER(GENRE_NAME)
LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%' AND STATUS IN ('S','P') GROUP BY MOVIE_ID,MOVIE_TITLE,DESCRIPTION,RATING,POSTER_PATH,RELEASE_DATE ORDER BY RELEASE_DATE DESC
